name: hacker (2024)
description:
This continuously watched game brings a rich and colorful world, with colorful color blocks, cute cartoon graphics, and dynamic and interesting game sound effects. Whether you enjoy leisurely time or thrilling gaming experiences, even watching can satisfy you. Both beginners and veterans will become addicted to this game and find their own gaming fun. Play and watch anytime, anywhere!



Gameplay

After entering the game, players will see a chessboard composed of blocks of different colors. Each square has its own unique color and shape. Players need to connect three or more blocks of the same color by swapping the positions of two adjacent blocks. When the connection is successful, these blocks will be eliminated.
